page.title: 18EVENTS IN TEMPLETON.
page.content: Templeton Ball is held on the Friday nearest to Saint David's Day to raise money for the village.The first ball was held to pay for the conversion of waste land into the Village Green. Tickets cost Â£6. There is a sit down buffet with a variety of foods.It has been held for the last 25 years. They always have a band to provide the music. Templeton Carnival is held in August on the Village Green.It is organized by the Young Farmers Club.The Carnival Queen,Rose Queen and Fairy Queen each with 2 attendants are chosen at a Disco Dance in July.The Carnival Procession on the Village Green is followed by the Judging of the Fancy Dress. Templeton Donkey Derby is held in August on the Village Green.Villagers and holiday makers are the jockeys.
